title: MultiVersus Could Make Tam's Dream Come True - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.18.21
description:
Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter code GAMES2021.

Go to http://expressvpn.com/games to get an extra 3 months FREE!

Go to http://amazon.com/kfgd to try Amazon Music Unlimited FREE for THREE months!

Go to http://butcherbox.com/kfgd to get FREE bacon and $20 off your first box!

Tim and Tam cover the latest update to the Activision Blizzard story, as well as the announcement of MultiVersus, a Smash Bros.-like game from Warner Bros.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:20 - Housekeeping
00:10:00 - PlayStation Boss Jim Ryan Criticizes Activision Blizzard Response To Bobby Kotick Report
00:15:30 - Activision Blizzard doubles down on Kotick defense in all-hands meeting
00:19:11 - Xbox Boss Phil Spencer Is Wary Of NFTs' Exploitative Possibilities
00:26:04 - Ads
00:30:20 - Warner Bros. Games Reveals MultiVersus, Makes Ultra Instinct Shaggy Real
00:42:57 - Capcom's Pragmata Has Officially Been Delayed To 2023
00:46:04 - The Super Smash Bros. Panda Global Circuit 2022 Will Be the First-Ever Officially Licensed Super Smash Bros. Championship
00:50:05 - Out today
00:52:23 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
00:54:09 - “I wanted to recommend a new podcast called Halo 2: Artifacts” - Mr Evil 37
00:55:00 - Squad Up: Jordan Lee Rowan - Xbox - ARowanStone
00:55:40 - You‘re Wrong
00:57:55 - Post Show
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Janet
